name: Chain Quest
description:
--- RECEPTION ---

"When you can combine role-playing action with puzzles, this makes for a very interesting experience. That’s just what you get in Chain Quest, an addictive puzzle game with a nice twist of fantasy role-playing mechanics." - Jeff Byrnes (AppAdvice)

"I can see this being a game you’ll keep coming back to, I couldn’t bring myself to stop playing it!" - Christopher Hannah (AppRecap)

"Combine the addictive nature of match three games with leveling up and battle. Thats right, you get an extremely addicting game called Chain Quest." - Ryan Poolos (Ray Wenderlich Reader's App Reviews)

--- ABOUT ---

Defeat your enemies and break all highscores in Chain Quest! Every fight is a thrilling puzzle of attack and defense. Level up your hero, unlock mighty skills and befriend frightening monsters.
Only if you master all your abilities you will have a chance to be one of the best in Chain Quest!
Can you become a champion of the chains?

Features

- Choose from three fearless heroes
- Defeat your enemies in an innovative puzzle fight system
- Earn experience and develop your hero as you like
- Unlock 50 unique skills and unleash them in the fight
- Collect different monsters and let them fight for you
- Set highscores and compete in global Game Center leaderboards
- Challenge your friends in local multiplayer
- Premium game: No in-app-purchases or hidden costs
- Universal app, play on your iPhone or iPad
